channel.title: Selling items.. and their codes
channel.description:
Ok, I need help with spawning NPCs and making them stay there permenetly.. then i need to be able to make them sell something then i need to choose what they sell
Example : Creating fish guild seller at varrock wild. Making him be able to be traded. Then making his stock have 999k sharks 999k monkfish 999k lobbies .. cooked and raw
Any help?

item.title: Selling items.. and their codes

@dead_4_u_now wrote:

lmao that so simple

Read full topic

item.title: Selling items.. and their codes
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

ok lol basically im going to make a tut for you

first go to autospawn.cfg and add this at the bottom

spawn = 592	3244	3519	0	0	0	0	0	1	Fish For PKing

then go to shops.cfg and add

shop = 50	Fish_For_PKing					1	1	385	10000	391	10000	397	10000	7946	10000

change the 50 to whatever is after the shop before say yours is 41 so it would be 42
then go to client.java and search for Aubury Rune shop then under it add

} else if (NPCID == 592) { //Fish For PKing PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 50; //Fish For PKing

close and save all of those files then compile and run and there should be a shop guy there sellin shark manta ray sea turtle and monkfish

Read full topic
